attributes.action: Pass a law to regulate Isle of Wight ferries and or push to have ferrie terminals owned by county councils.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would like to see a law passed to regulate the Isle of Wight ferries and their operations which would include pricing and fares timetables and future plansThe present arragement of 2 ferrie companies operating to the Island is not sutable now more compertion is needed as certainly Wightlink and Red funnel hold what seems to be full control over the crossing to the Isle of Wight Also they own several of the harbours/ports of entry which should not be the case.
It would be better for the local county councils to own those ports which would also include the harbours at Yarmouth and Lymington.
